import{ArrowRightIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import logo from"./image/logo.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const location=useLocation();const[backgroundColor,setBackgroundColor]=useState('');const[fontColor,setFontColor]=useState('');const[hireMeColor,setHireMeColor]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const currentPath=location.pathname;// Set different background colors based on the current route
